name: display
type: none, block, inline, inline-block, flex, inline-flex, grid, inline-grid, table, table-row, table-cell, list-item, initial, inherit

name: content
type: normal, none, <string>, <counter>, <attr>, open-quote, close-quote, no-open-quote, no-close-quote, initial, inherit

name: resize
type: none, both, horizontal, vertical, initial, inherit

name: cursor
type: alias, all-scroll, auto, cell, context-menu, col-resize, copy, crosshair, default, e-resize, ew-resize, grab, grabbing, help, move, n-resize, ne-resize, nesw-resize, ns-resize, nw-resize, nwse-resize, no-drop, none, not-allowed, pointer, progress, row-resize, s-resize, se-resize, sw-resize, text, vertical-text, w-resize, wait, zoom-in, zoom-out, initial, inherit

name: clear
type: none, left, right, both, initial, inherit

name: overflow
type: visible, hidden, scroll, auto, initial, inherit

name: overflow-x
type: visible, hidden, scroll, auto, initial, inherit

name: overflow-y
type: visible, hidden, scroll, auto, initial, inherit

name: position
type: static, relative, absolute, fixed, sticky, initial, inherit

name: flex-direction
type: row, row-reverse, column, column-reverse, initial, inherit

name: align-content
type: stretch, center, flex-start, flex-end, space-between, space-around, initial, inherit

name: align-items
type: stretch, center, flex-start, flex-end, baseline, initial, inherit

name: align-self
type: auto, stretch, center, flex-start, flex-end, baseline, initial, inherit

name: justify-content
type: flex-start, flex-end, center, space-between, space-around, space-evenly, initial, inherit

name: animation-direction
type: normal, reverse, alternate, alternate-reverse, initial, inherit

name: animation-fill-mode
type: none, forwards, backwards, both, initial, inherit

name: animation-timing-function
type: linear, ease, ease-in, ease-out, ease-in-out, step-start, step-end, steps(<number>, start|end), cubic-bezier(<number>, <number>, <number>, <number>), initial, inherit

name: transition-timing-function
type: linear, ease, ease-in, ease-out, ease-in-out, step-start, step-end, steps(<number>, start|end), cubic-bezier(<number>, <number>, <number>, <number>), initial, inherit

name: background-repeat
type: repeat, repeat-x, repeat-y, no-repeat, space, round, initial, inherit

name: border-bottom-style
type: none, hidden, dotted, dashed, solid, double, groove, ridge, inset, outset, initial, inherit

name: border-image-repeat
type: stretch, repeat, round, space, initial, inherit

name: border-left-style
type: none, hidden, dotted, dashed, solid, double, groove, ridge, inset, outset, initial, inherit

name: border-right-style
type: none, hidden, dotted, dashed, solid, double, groove, ridge, inset, outset, initial, inherit

name: border-style
type: none, hidden, dotted, dashed, solid, double, groove, ridge, inset, outset, initial, inherit

name: border-top-style
type: none, hidden, dotted, dashed, solid, double, groove, ridge, inset, outset, initial, inherit

name: font-stretch
type: ultra-condensed, extra-condensed, condensed, semi-condensed, normal, semi-expanded, expanded, extra-expanded, ultra-expanded, initial, inherit

name: font-weight
type: normal, bold, bolder, lighter, <number>, initial, inherit

name: list-style-type
type: disc, circle, square, decimal, decimal-leading-zero, lower-roman, upper-roman, lower-greek, lower-latin, upper-latin, armenian, georgian, lower-alpha, upper-alpha, none, initial, inherit

name: outline-style
type: none, dotted, dashed, solid, double, groove, ridge, inset, outset, initial, inherit

name: text-align
type: left, right, center, justify, initial, inherit

name: text-align-last
type: auto, left, right, center, justify, start, end, initial, inherit

name: text-decoration
type: none, [underline, overline, line-through, blink], initial, inherit

name: text-decoration-line
type: none, underline, overline, line-through, blink, initial, inherit

name: text-decoration-style
type: solid, double, dotted, dashed, wavy, initial, inherit

name: text-justify
type: auto, none, inter-word, inter-character, distribute, initial, inherit

name: text-transform
type: none, capitalize, uppercase, lowercase, full-width, initial, inherit

name: vertical-align
type: baseline, sub, super, text-top, text-bottom, middle, top, bottom, <length>, <percentage>, initial, inherit

name: white-space
type: normal, nowrap, pre, pre-wrap, pre-line, initial, inherit

name: word-break
type: normal, break-all, keep-all, break-word, initial, inherit

name: column-rule-style
type: none, hidden, dotted, dashed, solid, double, groove, ridge, inset, outset, initial, inherit

name: page-break-after
type: auto, always, avoid, left, right, initial, inherit

name: page-break-before
type: auto, always, avoid, left, right, initial, inherit
